original: Hoff, Gösta Teodor, jur. kand., ombudsman, Göteborg, f. 27/1/05 i Gbg av bankkamr. Harald H. o. Sigrid Bolin. G. 35 m. Birgit Eiserman. Barn: Lärs-Erik f. 36, Kristina 41. ■— Studiex. 23, jur. kand. 29. Tingstjg. i Marks doms. 29-31, aman. samt tf. ombudsman h. Gbgs stads fattigv :styr. 32-38, därefter sekr. o. ombudsman där. Bitr. tj :man h. Gbgs stadskolleg. sed. 36, sekr. i ett flertal stadsfuHm :ut-redn., kronoombud i taxmd 46, ordf. i dito 47.
translated: Hoff, Gösta Teodor, Bachelor of Laws (jur. kand.), attorney, Gothenburg, born January 27, 1905, in Gothenburg to bank clerk Harald H. and Sigrid Bolin. Married in 1935 to Birgit Eiserman. Children: Lärs-Erik, born 1936, Kristina, born 1941. Completed secondary school studies in 1923 and law degree in 1929. Served as a court clerk in Marks District Court from 1929 to 1931, and then as acting attorney and temporary representative for the Gothenburg City Poor Board from 1932 to 1938, subsequently serving as secretary and attorney there. Assistant official at the Gothenburg City College since 1936, secretary in various city council committees, tax administrator in the county board in 1946, and chairman in 1947.
